item.title: Gadwal Police Solve Rs 15 Lakh Cigarette Theft: Two Arrested, One Missing
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: The police in Jogulamba Gadwal district quickly solved a big theft involving cigarette cartons worth about ₹15 lakhs. They arrested two suspects, while one is still missing. A Maruti Eeco van and two mobile phones used for the crime were also seized.
On July 12, 2025, B. Vinay Kumar, a businessman from Venkatapuram village in Aiza Mandal, reported a theft. He stated that he runs the “Jayalakshmi Agency” and, on the night of July 11, 2025, he locked up his shop at 9:00 P...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Https, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here

item.title: Indira Mahila Shakti Mission 2025: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy Leads Women Empowerment Drive in KT Doddi
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a remarkable step towards women’s empowerment and community welfare, Gadwal MLA Sri Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy participated as the chief guest in the Indira Mahila Shakti Mission - 2025 Celebrations held at KT Doddi mandal in Gadwal constituency.
The event was organized to celebrate the ongoing success of the Indira Mahila Shakti Mission and to promote the welfare schemes being implemented by the Telangana State Government under the leadership of Chief Minister Revanth Reddy.
Grand ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
